name: Moguls of the Serpentine Guard
description: Often found in nearby Wandererâ€™s Refuge, the Moguls of the Serpentine Guard are known for their obsession with decomposition, be it fungi or poison. Now serving as guards-for-hire using their high-tech defensive equipment, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
